description.value:
The dragon's halo divides into smaller halos, hovering over up to six creatures of the dragon's choice within its inspiring presence aura. Creatures wearing a halo gain fast healing equal to half the dragon's level for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.Effect: Restorative Halo]

The dragon cannot use other abilities of its halo while other creatures wear it, and they can Dismiss the effect for any or all affected creatures.
